title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: An error message is thrown when using the expression new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in a table filter.
OB: When attempting to use the expression new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in a table filter, an error message is displayed.
EB: The value new Date('3/2/2005') should be accepted as a valid input in a table filter without throwing an error.
SR:
1. Create a datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and create a filter based on the datetime column.
3. In the filter's value field, input the expression new Date('3/2/2005').
